tool_description: Search addresses by latitude/longitude coordinates. Get address details and distance to the provided location.
name: Geoapify Reverse Geocoding
title: Geoapify Reverse Geocoding

api_list.name: reverse-geocoding
api_list.description: Reverse Geocoding API returns a location with an address by Lon/Lat coordinates. It's widely used to define user location by GPS coordinates or find a building address on a map, for example, by user click.
